description: Setting the absolute  X (left and right direction) position coordinates of the probe(SPM tip)
arg_description: Coordinate value of X in nanometers

description: Setting the absolute  Y (up and down direction) position coordinates of the probe(SPM tip)
arg_description: Coordinate value of Y in nanometers.

description: Sets the relative X(left/right direction) position to be moved from the current coordinates of the probe(SPM tip)
arg_description: Distance to be move in  X, in nanometers

description: Sets the relative Y (up/down direction) position to be moved from the current coordinates of the probe(SPM tip)
arg_description: Distance to be move in Y, in nanometers

description: The bias voltage add to the measured sample
arg_description: the value of the sample bias

description: Setting the scanning area range of the X size
arg_description: scan range of the X direction in nanometers

description: Setting the scanning area range of the Y size
arg_description: scan range of the Y direction in nanometers
true to start the scan and false to stop the scan
